thread.title: Storage & Archive Engineer - Sports Media

title: Storage & Archive Engineer - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Storage & Archive Engineer Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Day to day care and feeding of our SANs and LTO Tape libraries and related software systems. Responsible for generating reports & SQL Queries to forecast storage needs & analyze usage.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
